about_the_game:
Our ancestors need your help! Step into the exhilarating world of Timerift Raiders, a fast-paced FPS that sends you back in time to confront and annihilate monstrous threats from history. Armed with superior modern equipment and advanced weapons, you are humanity’s last hope against these ancient horrors in this intense single-player experience.

The story

Live the story of a veteran soldier who finds a job in a secret military organization. Your mission: go back in time and eliminate any monsters known in history. This is why people believe dragons don’t exist! After the invention of time travel, we've eliminated every monster from the timeline. Embark on a thrilling journey to ensure the safety of humanity by erasing these mythical threats from existence.

Time-Travel Adventure: Explore beautifully crafted historical landscapes, from ancient ruins to medieval castles.

Relentless Action: Engage in heart-pounding combat against a variety of monstrous foes, from terrifying dragons to ferocious beasts, each possessing unique abilities and tactics. Experience the thrill of rapid movement, quick reflexes, and non-stop action that keeps your adrenaline pumping.

Expand Your Arsenal: Arm yourself with a variety of powerful weapons, each with unique strengths. Upgrade your weapons and unlock new ones as you progress, ensuring you have the firepower needed to take down the toughest foes.

Are you ready to dive into the past and face the awakening monsters head-on? Gear up for an unforgettable adventure in Timerift Raiders: The Past Awakens. The fate of history rests in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes: As a first-person shooter (FPS) game, the entire gameplay involves intense combat scenarios with visible blood effects and frequent depictions of character deaths.

name: Timerift Raiders: The Past Awakens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8 core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: no

short_description: Our ancestors need your help! In this fast-paced FPS, travel back in time to confront and annihilate monstrous threats from history. Armed with modern equipment and advanced weapons, experience the thrilling contrast of modern firepower against ancient enemies in an intense single-player adventure.
